name: github
description: GitHub integration for repository management, issues, and pull requests
security_notes: WRITE ACCESS: Can create issues, PRs, comments, and modify repository content
Use fine-grained Personal Access Tokens (PATs) scoped to specific repos
Never use classic PATs with broad access
Enable branch protection rules on important branches
Review all automated commits before merging
setup_steps: 1. Go to GitHub Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens
3. For fine-grained: Select specific repositories and permissions
4. Minimum permissions: Contents (read), Issues (read/write), Pull requests (read/write)
8. Copy the config section to your Claude Code settings
